content:
Earn Money Online with Leaf

Turn your time into income with Leaf, Ethiopia’s trusted task-earning platform. Whether you’re watching videos, completing offers, or engaging with ads, Leaf pays you real money every month — in ETB or crypto.
Why other earning apps let you down Too many apps make promises they never keep:
  • Minimum withdrawal limits that take forever to reach,
  • Complicated processes that waste your time,
  • Payments that are slow, inconsistent, or never arrive.
Leaf is different. We built our platform for Ethiopian users who want fair, transparent, and reliable earnings. No tricks, no hidden rules — just real money for real effort.

How Leaf Works

Getting started with Leaf is quick and easy:
  1. Sign up – Create your Leaf account in minutes
  2. Complete tasks – Watch videos, try offers (like AdGate & more), or click CPC ads.
  3. Get paid monthly – At the end of each month, you’ll receive payment in ETB or crypto, based on the tasks you’ve completed.

Why Choose Leaf

  • No minimum threshold – You’ll be paid whatever you’ve earned, every month.
  • Multiple earning options – Videos, offers, CPC ads, and more.
  • Local & global payouts – Choose between Ethiopian Birr or cryptocurrency.
  • Simple, transparent, and fair – What you see is what you get.
  • Built for Ethiopia – Tailored for local users with real payouts that matter.

Earn in Ways that Fit Your Lifestyle

  • Watch videos → Get rewarded for your attention.
  • AdGate & other offers → Complete tasks, sign-ups, and surveys to earn more.
  • CPC Ads → Click, engage, and earn instantly.

Payment You Can Trust

Unlike platforms that hold your money hostage behind endless limits, Leaf pays you monthly, automatically. Whether you’ve earned a little or a lot, your payout will arrive on time, every time.

Start Earning with Leaf Today

Join the growing community of Ethiopian users who are turning their online activity into real money. Sign up now, complete your first task, and let Leaf pay you for your time.
